thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: CARMICHAEL

author: CARMICHAEL
title: CARMICHAEL
text: never heard of Amoma and was transferred from trip advisor booked the hotel but was very dubious that when I arrived at the hotel they would say I would have to pay again, but on arrival they had been paid so no problems so although I was very dubious the whole operation was faultless and I would have no problems using them again. Maybe a bit of advertising promoting Amoma to make people aware of who they are
